ec_launchers/beam/mode.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: ec_launchers/beam/mode
IDS: ec_launchers
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 2
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 3
PARENT_CONTAINER: ec_launchers/beam
FIELD_NAME: mode
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: ec_launchers -> beam -> mode

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Identifier for the main plasma wave mode excited by the EC beam. For the ordinary mode (O-mode), mode=1. For the extraordinary mode (X-mode), mode=-1

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[ec_launchers]: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies.
CONTAINER[ec_launchers/beam]: Set of Electron Cyclotron beams

ec_launchers/beam/o_mode_fraction.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: ec_launchers/beam/o_mode_fraction
IDS: ec_launchers
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 2
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 3
PARENT_CONTAINER: ec_launchers/beam
FIELD_NAME: o_mode_fraction
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: ec_launchers -> beam -> o_mode_fraction

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Fraction of EC beam power launched in ordinary (O) mode. If all power is launched in ordinary mode (O-mode), o_mode_fraction = 1.0. If all  power is launched in extraordinary mode (X-mode), o_mode_fraction = 0.0

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[ec_launchers]: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies.
CONTAINER[ec_launchers/beam]: Set of Electron Cyclotron beams

ec_launchers/beam/steering_angle_pol.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: ec_launchers/beam/steering_angle_pol
IDS: ec_launchers
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 2
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 3
PARENT_CONTAINER: ec_launchers/beam
FIELD_NAME: steering_angle_pol
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: ec_launchers -> beam -> steering_angle_pol

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Steering angle of the EC beam in the R,Z plane (from the -R axis towards the -Z axis), angle_pol=atan2(-k_Z,-k_R), where k_Z and k_R are the Z and R components of the mean wave vector in the EC beam

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[ec_launchers]: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies.
CONTAINER[ec_launchers/beam]: Set of Electron Cyclotron beams

ec_launchers/beam/steering_angle_tor.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: ec_launchers/beam/steering_angle_tor
IDS: ec_launchers
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 2
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 3
PARENT_CONTAINER: ec_launchers/beam
FIELD_NAME: steering_angle_tor
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: ec_launchers -> beam -> steering_angle_tor

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Steering angle of the EC beam away from the poloidal plane that is increasing towards the positive phi axis, angle_tor=arcsin(k_phi/k), where k_phi is the component of the wave vector in the phi direction and k is the length of the wave vector. Here the term wave vector refers to the mean wave vector in the EC beam

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[ec_launchers]: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies.
CONTAINER[ec_launchers/beam]: Set of Electron Cyclotron beams

FIELD_NAME: size
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: ec_launchers -> beam -> spot -> size

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Size of the spot ellipse: distance between the central ray and the peripheral rays in the horizontal (first index of the first coordinate) and vertical direction (second index of the first coordinate)

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[ec_launchers]: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies.
CONTAINER[ec_launchers/beam]: Set of Electron Cyclotron beams
CONTAINER[ec_launchers/beam/spot]: Spot ellipse characteristics at launch

ec_launchers/latency.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: ec_launchers/latency
IDS: ec_launchers
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 1
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 2
PARENT_CONTAINER: ec_launchers
FIELD_NAME: latency
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: ec_launchers -> latency

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Upper bound of the delay between input command received from the RT network and actuator starting to react. Applies globally to the system described by this IDS unless specific latencies (e.g. channel-specific or antenna-specific) are provided at a deeper level in the IDS structure.

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[ec_launchers]: Launchers for heating and current drive in the electron cyclotron (EC) frequencies.
